name: Russian Dancing Men
description:
The best 5-Star rhythm action game on the App store!

***Nominated for Indie Game Magazine Game of the Year***

---5 STAR REVIEWERS SAY---

- “This is the best app on my iPad! I find I go on it a lot more than Angry Birds or Cut The Rope :)”

- “My only complaint is that I can't give it more stars :D”

- “Addictive and enjoyable – best thing since Angry Birds!”


---OFFICIAL REVIEWS---

"Russian Dancing Men is full of personality and humor." - Slidetoplay (01.11.11)

"You get a lot for your minimal money." - MoaBG (27.10.11)

"If you're a fan of rhythm games…. definitely check it out" - AppSpy (24.10.11)

“One of the most off the wall music games since the original PaRappa the Rapper” Modojo (11.11.11)

“Amazingly awesome and hilariously bizarre” MacEnstein (04.12.11)

“This game is unbelievable!” CGRUndertow (02.11.11)



---RUSSIAN DANCING MEN THE GAME---

Dance, Jump, Spin & Slide with The Russian Dancing Men!

Play their epic journey, packed full of the most popular songs from YouTube comedy legends Weebl's Stuff!

Can you get The Russian Dancing Men home without laughing yourself unconscious?

---OVER 125 MILLION VIEWS ON YOUTUBE!---

FEATURED SONGS INCLUDE:
Badger Badger,
Kenya,
Narwhals,
Amazing Horse,
Magical Trevor,
Crabs - and more!

Playable on iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch (iOS 4.0 and above*).

AWARD-WINNING ANIMATION!
Hand-crafted by Weebl and his pack of cartoon elves!

SIDE-SPLITTING SONGS!
And you won’t stop humming them!

5 DIFFICULTY LEVELS!
NEW - Tap Mode lets you easily control your dancers with a single touch
But will you ever conquer the impossible new ARRGGH! difficulty levels?

MASSIVE POINTS!
Dance over, under and through multiple obstacles - the better you dance, the more you score!

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS!
Will you conquer the leaderboards and unlock all the new & hidden achievements?

UPGRADES A PLENTY
Need more rhythm? Unlock the Red Army in the game for unlimited Russian Dancing Men!

*Playable on iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPad 1, iPad 2 and iPod Touch (3rd Gen. and above).


Latest update includes the following bug fixes:

-Timing issue with iPhone devices.

-Easy difficulty sometimes returning players to Normal difficulty.

-Crash bug on Anywhere level on iPhone devices.

-Gameplay timing tweaks to levels.

Thanks to everyone who is helping us improve the game. Please continue to email feedback@russiandancingmen.com with any comments, questions or issues - happy dancing!
